summary: After her husband's death a woman is called by someone who has gained access to her phone, car, everything electronic. He tells her that he has her daughter. And if she wants to see her ... See full summary »
cast: Meredith Monroe|Brian Dietzen|Lochlyn Munro|Brian Krause|Brittany Renee Finamore|Miriam Flynn|Richard Riehle|Michael Badalucco|Dan Kelpine|Gary Weeks|Eli Bildner|Marcus Shultz|Nick Holmes|Frederick Keith Johnson|Anthony Spagnola
title: Sin vía de escape
